name: Boss Simulator 2021
description:
Right-Click to move.

Left Click on Employees (green vests) to tell them what to do.

Left Click+Drag to rotate the camera.

Mouse-over employees, customers and merchandise to see more information.

Keep the shelves stocked and check out lines moving!

Make sure you and your employees don't get too stressed out or you'll make your customers unhappy, which will make them cut their shopping trip short!

The Boss can lower his stress levels by hanging out in the manager's office, employees can relax in the break room.
